description:
Mobilā aplikācija Mēness Aptiekas tika radīta speciāli ciešākai sadarbībai ar mūsu klientiem.

Iespējas:
1) Vairāk nekā 200 mūsu aptieku vienā aplikācijā. Jūs viegli varat atrast vistuvāko sev strādājošo aptieku, un izveidot maršrutu līdz tai.
2) Vairāk nekā 15 000 preču. Šeit Jūs varat atrast informāciju par Jums interesējošiem uztura bagātinātājiem un zālēm, kā arī uzzināt, kurās tieši mūsu aptiekās dotā prece ir pieejama. 
3) Visjaunākie speciālie piedāvājumi. Mūsu aptieku tīkls pastāvīgi veido jaunus speciālos piedāvājumus saviem pastāvīgiem klientiem. Esiet informēts par jaunākajām izmaiņām!
4) Iespēja sazināties. Aplikācijā ir dažādas saziņas iespējas kā ar mūsu aptiekām, tā arī ar administrāciju. Jūs vienmēr varat uzdot Jūsu interesējošo jautājumu un saņemt savlaicīgu atbildi.

Mēs pastāvīgi strādājam pie informācijas aktualizācijas par mūsu aptieku tīklu un tās sortimentu. Tāpēc neaizmirstiet laicīgi atjaunināt aplikāciju!

Latviski

Aplikācija ļauj Tev atrast tuvumā esošās BENU aptiekas un izmantot šā brīža akciju un individuālo piedāvājumu priekšrocības, kā arī iepirkties BENU e-aptiekā – droši, ērti un izdevīgi! Turklāt aplikācija ietver BENU lojalitātes kartes atbalstu un ļauj Tev piekļūt BENU lojalitātes kartes lietotāja profilam. Tu vari pārbaudīt savu punktu bilanci un sekot lojalitātes līmenim, ko esi sasniedzis. Papildus tam, aplikācija ļauj aplūkot BENU Aptiekās veikto pirkumu vēsturi.

Tavai ērtībai aplikācija atbalsta arī medikamentu dozatoru, kas palīdzēs Tev ikdienā, nodrošinot ar vienkāršu rīku, lai kontrolētu Tev nozīmētā medikamenta uzņemšanu. Pēc tam, kad Tu ievadīsi medikamenta nosaukumu, devas un lietošanas instrukciju, Tu varēsi lietot atgādni un sekot savas tablešu kārbiņas saturam.

 
Russian

Приложение позволяет Тебе найти близлежащие аптеки BENU и воспользоваться преимуществами действующих акций и индивидуальных предложений, а также совершать покупки в э-аптеке BENU – безопасно, удобно и выгодно.  К тому же приложение поддерживает карту лояльности BENU и позволяет Тебе получить доступ к профилю пользователя карты лояльности BENU. Ты можешь проверить свой баланс накопленных пунктов и следить за достигнутым уровнем лояльности. Кроме того, приложение дает Тебе возможность посмотреть историю покупок в аптеках BENU.


English

The application allows you to find BENU Pharmacies nearby and to take advantages of ongoing promotions and our personalised offers, as well as to make purchases in BENU e-pharmacy safely, conveniently, and profitably.  Moreover, the application includes BENU loyalty card support and allows you to access the profile of BENU loyalty card holder. You are invited to check the balance of points, follow the tier and loyalty level that you have achieved. In addition, application allows you to view the purchase history in BENU Pharmacies.

Saņemiet tūlītēju ārsta konsultāciju attālināti, lai kur jūs atrastos - video vai čata veidā. Saņemiet rekomendācijas veselības stāvokļa uzlabošanai, e-recepti, nosūtījumus pie speciālistiem, nosūtījumus uz analīzēm un izmeklējumiem, konsultācijas slēdzienu. Konsultācijas sniedz pieredzējuši un Latvijā sertificēti ārsti.                                                           

Jums un Jūsu ģimenei
-	Esam atvērti darba dienās un brīvdienās, ieskaitot vakarus
-	Saņemiet sertificēta speciālista konsultāciju
-	Saņemiet vai atjaunojiet e-receptes
-	Saņemiet nosūtījumus

Jūs varat konsultēties ar ārstu bez pieraksta, vai pierakstīties pie jūsu izvēlēta ārsta. 

Jaunais ārstniecības modelis nodrošina nepārtrauktu ārstniecību, sniedzot jums iespēju nepārtrauktai saziņai ar ārstu – jūs varat uzdot ārstam savus jautājumus pirms vai pēc konsultācijas - čatojot, vai saņemt video konsultāciju. Ārsta pieejamība ļauj laicīgāk uzstādīt diagnozi, atvieglo ārstēšanu un ietaupa jūsu naudu un laiku. 

KĀ DARBOJAS?
Lejuplādējiet MyEmerg lietotni, autentificējieties un konsultējieties ar ārstu attālināti šajā lietotnē.

Konsultācijas APMAKSAS VEIDI:
- ar apdrošināšanas polisi
- ar maksājuma karti
- ar Apple Pay

KVALITATĪVA VESELĪBAS APRŪPE JEBKURĀ VIETĀ
Varbūt dzīvojat tālu no pilsētas? Varbūt jūsu pilsētā nav speciālistu attiecīgajā jomā? Vai varbūt veselība neļauj apmeklēt ārstu klātienē? Tagad jūs varat attālināti sazināties ar ārstu. Ātri, lēti un neizejot no mājām!

OTRA ĀRSTA VIEDOKLIS
Jūs bijāt pie ārsta, bet neesat pārliecināts par uzstādīto diagnozi, un vēlaties konsultēties ar citu ārstu - tagad to izdarīt ir viegli.

HRONISKU SLIMĪBU PACIENTIEM
Hroniskas slimības ir saistītas ar regulāru ambulatoro apmeklējumu, kas prasa daudz enerģijas un laika. Tagad jūs varat konsultēties un uzdot savus jautājumus ārstam attālināti.

ESOT ĀRZEMĒS
Saņemt medicīnisku konsultāciju citā valstī ir sarežģīti un laikietilpīgi. Sazinieties ar ārstu tūlīt, turklāt savā dzimtajā valodā. Ātri un bez rindām!

DEPRESIJAS GADĪJUMOS
Depresija ir viena no mūsu gadsimta bīstamākajām slimībām. Cilvēks nevēlas doties pie ārsta un izvairās no citiem cilvēkiem. Pateicoties psihologa attālinātām konsultācijām - video un čata veidā, depresijas ārstēšana kļūst daudz vienkāršāka.

PADOMI PAR MEDIKAMENTU LIETOŠANU
Lietojot medikamentus, ir svarīgi tos lietot atbilstošās devās, pareizi un būt pārliecinātam, ka tos drīkst lietot vienlaikus ar citām zālēm. Izmantojot lietotni, jūs varat uzdot ārstam savus jautājumus par medikamentu lietošanu, neizejot no mājām. 

KĀ SAMAZINĀT SVARU/ AKTĪVI SPORTOJOT
Konsultējieties ar uztura speciālistu, kas palīdzēs sasniegt jūsu izvirzītos mērķus ātrāk. Saņemiet individuāli pielāgotu uztura terapiju un rekomendācijas. Jūs varat jautāt par visu: uzturu, motivāciju, vai produkts ir veselīgs.

NEATLIECIET SAVUS VESELĪBAS JAUTĀJUMUS
Nopietnas slimības visbiežāk rodas no savlaikus neārstētām problēmām. Bieži vien cilvēki nevar atrast laiku aizbraukt pie ārsta, vai dažkārt problēma ir delikāta un cilvēki izvēlas jautājumu paturēt pie sevis. Tagad par visiem veselības jautājumiem jūs varat konsultēties tūlīt - attālināti.

BIEŽĀK RISINĀTIE VESELĪBAS JAUTĀJUMI:
- Elpceļi: akūtas infekcijas, klepus, sinusīts, drudzis, temperatūra;
- Sirds un asinsrites sistēma: paaugstināts/pazemināts asinsspiediens, sirdsklauves, paaugstināts holesterīns u.c.;
- Endokrīnā sistēma: diabēts, vielmaiņas slimības, imunitātes traucējumi u.c.;
- Kuņģa-zarnu trakts: aizcietējums, caureja u.c.;
- Skeleta-muskuļu sistēma: locītavu slimības, osteoartrīts, reimatisms u.c.; 
- Uroģenitālās sistēmas: urīnceļu/urīnpūšļa infekcijas, menstruāciju traucējumi, menopauzes problēmas u.c.;
- Nervu sistēma: galvassāpes, migrēna u.c.;
- Mentālās veselības problēmas: depresija, trauksme, izdegšana u.c.;
- Traumas: sasitumi, sastiepumi, brūces u.c.;
- Ādas problēmas;
- Kontracepcija;
- Bezmiegs un miega problēmas;
- Svara samazināšana;
- Pie kāda speciālista vērsties?

With the defitraining by SCHILLER application, control and interact remotely with the training defibrillator to create  realistic scenarios. 

Interrupt scenarios for an explanation, move forward in the resuscitation process, start again from the beginning... 

The defitraining by SCHILLER application offers you flexibility and autonomy in defibrillator and cardiac massage training.

Configure your SCHILLER training defibrillator easily with the defitraining application.

Using it is adopting it!

Analyze snoring, talking, sounds, and more. Track your night like never before!
Awake or deep, light sleep too, Track it all—it’s made for you.

→ High-quality sleep audio recordings.
→ Make every morning a data-rich start to a well-rested day!
→ Get useful in-depth analysis and a tailored sleep experience with Prime Sleep Recorder.

Have less stress and listen to your snoring symphony or sleep-talking highlights. 
See the charts every morning. App with unique features and technologies to analyze your sleep and  improve the quality of your rest.

INSIGHTFUL MORNINGS
Just one click and Prime Sleep Recorder will collects and evaluates data, providing you with valuable insights every morning when you wake up.

TECHNOLOGY
Prime Sleep Recorder optimizes microphone sensitivity, utilizing your phone's hardware for precise sleep analysis through AI, providing accurate and visualized sleep data.

SCIENCE
Snore detection is powered by Artificial Intelligence (A.I.) with the support of a new Apple machine-learning technology. By using a large number of snoring and sleeping samples from various users, we are able to deliver a precise sleep analysis tailored to each individual in statistics and in snoring detection. Your personalized evaluation is crafted based on the vast dataset, ensuring a unique and tailored experience for every user.

HIGHLIGHTS:
▷ PERSONAL SLEEP SYMPHONY RECORDING
▷ EASY TO USE
▷ HIGH TECH SNORING DETECTION
Accurate snoring detection based on A.I.
▷ ONE CLICK POSSIBILITY TO RECORD ONLY SNORING
▷ LIFESTYLE FACTORS, WAKE-UP MOOD, NOTES
Assign factors (alcohol, coffee, stress, etc.) to each night and the mood after waking up, or add your own notes.
▷ AUDIO VISUALIZATION DURING RECORDING OR PLAYING
▷ MEMORY SAVING SYSTEM ON YOUR PHONE
aac audio compression for the best ratio quality and size
▷ EASY SHARING OF YOUR SLEEP SYMPHONY WITH YOUR FRIENDS:
Your sleep stories are meant to be heard. Turn your sleep recordings into a social media sensation!
▷ CHART AND DATA OF NOISE IN THE ROOM DURING THE NIGHT
▷ ADJUSTABLE RECORDING SOUND SENSITIVITY:
For different sound conditions in your room (a quiet or loud environment)
▷ ACTIVATION DELAY
Starts monitoring after a preset period of time.

▷ BACKGROUND MODE:
Monitoring and alarm runs also in background mode. Use your smartphone as usual without limitation.
▷ APPLE HEALTH INTEGRATION
▷ iCLOUD SYNCHRONIZATION
Synchronization among your devices and between free and paid versions.
▷ EXPORTING OF HISTORY TO CSV FILE

OPTIONAL APP EXTRAS:
●  Smart Alarms
●  Stop Snoring
●  Sleepy Sounds
● … and more

Our team is constantly working on new improvements to enhance your experience.

KNOW YOUR SLEEP HABITS WITH APP DESIGNED FOR:
Insomnia Fighters: tailored solutions for those battling with insomnia or other difficulties falling asleep.
Sleep Talkers and Snorers: capture and analyze your sleep talk and snoring patterns.

Focused Minds: Ideal for individuals wanting to enhance concentration for work or study.

Noise-Prone Sleepers: Designed for those easily affected by environmental noise during sleep.
Students under Pressure: Support for students facing the stress of examinations and schoolwork.
Quality Sleep Seekers: Tailored features for individuals striving to improve overall sleep quality.
Prime Sleep Recorder is more than an app; it's your personalized sleep companion, providing insights for a diverse range of sleep needs.

The Pregnancy + tracker app wishes you a healthy, full-term pregnancy and a safe delivery.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.

Lin X is an application available on your phone used to receive and display the glucose concentration value and remind when the blood glucose value exceeds the upper or lower limit of the preset blood glucose value. It also has system Settings and other functions to help users analyze and evaluate the glucose reading of the continuous glucose monitoring system and form a report. 

Measuremenrs displayed on LinX cannot be used for the diagnosis and screening of diabetes. If users need help, please advise with professions for further medical assistance.


Note: 
The compatible medical hardware is available in the following countries/regions: Indonesia.

Are you ready to stay One Step Ahead of your diabetes?
Now you can, from wherever you are, with Dexcom Clarity.
 
View glucose patterns, trends and statistics so you know how close you are to your target range, anytime, anywhere you have internet connectivity. Log in with your Dexcom account to view patterns and trends so you can make informed decisions to help you manage your diabetes.
 
•	Check in with the Summary dashboard to track your progress.
•	With Reports, you can view, save, print or email any or all of Clarity's reports.
•	Use Share to accept your clinic's sharing code so they have access to your data to make your appointments more efficient.
•	In Profile, turn on weekly notifications and emails.
 
This app store should not be used as your first point of contact to resolve technical or customer services issues. In order to protect your privacy and personal information, and promptly resolve any technical or customer services issues you are having with any Dexcom product, please contact your local Dexcom representative.

ContraC - это мобильное приложение, которое разработано специально для беременных женщин, чтобы помочь им контролировать схватки. С помощью этого приложения вы можете легко отслеживать и записывать время и длительность схваток, а также их частоту. Вы можете использовать эту информацию для оценки того, когда пришло время идти в родильный дом.

ContraC предоставляет вам простой и интуитивно понятный интерфейс, который позволяет вам быстро и легко записывать информацию о ваших схватках.

«Календарь Месячных» — это ваш персональный помощник для отслеживания менструального цикла.
Приложение позволяет легко и точно настроить дату начала последних месячных, а также указать индивидуальные параметры — длительность цикла и самих месячных.

Следите за прошедшими, текущими и будущими днями прямо в удобном и понятном календаре.
Прогноз следующего периода поможет вам быть готовой заранее и избежать неожиданных ситуаций.

Начало менструации можно отметить в один клик — быстро, просто и удобно.
Календарь оформлен в современном и приятном стиле, чтобы пользоваться им было комфортно каждый день.

Интерфейс интуитивно понятен, подходит как для подростков, так и для взрослых женщин.
С «Календарём Месячных» вы всегда будете чувствовать уверенность и контроль.
Приложение идеально подойдёт для регулярного и точного отслеживания цикла.

- Правила использования: https://drive.google.com/file/d/15h9QKv03W5sszxgsQhX3Hqqh9FvNBU_e/view?usp=sharing

This App is a handy and reliable assistant for tracking your newborn baby’s daily activities. You can track breastfeeding, bottle feeding, solid food feeding and milk pumping. You can save diaper changes, sleeping periods and the results of your baby's height and weight measurements.

With this baby care app, you get all of these incredible features:
- Track feeding by one breast or by both, if you give your baby two breasts at one feeding
- Track bottle feeding 
- Fix solid food feeding - food and its amount
- If you need to express your milk, you can fix how many ml/oz of each breast were pumped 
- Fix diaper changing, you can note whether it is wet or dirty, or both :slightly_smiling_face:
- Always know how many diapers were changed per day
- Record baths, temperatures, walks, and medications
- Handy breastfeeding timer and sleeping timer are easy to stop and to restart
- Your baby's height and weight can be measured almost daily! They are also easily stored in the baby diary. 
- Add a reminder for each event - periodic and easy-to-set
- Log and track the activity of several babies. Supports twins!

Being a FTM (first-time-mom), or mom in general, is very tiring and challenging! You’ve just made it home from the hospital, exhausted and overwhelmed by your new responsibilities, and need a little help. Don’t worry! In the first few months of your baby's life, it really revolves around eating, sleeping, diaper changes and occasional little doctor's visits. As a new mom, it’s not always easy to remember the last time you fed your baby or changed their diaper. We don’t blame you for falling asleep on the couch occasionally, so we’ve got you covered with handy alarms and reminders. Alarms and graphs are a great way to have an at-a-glance look at what you need to do without stressing over "what if I forget?”.

Our app will help you keep track of feedings, your baby’s weight and how long they were eating to make sure they’re gaining weight properly and at a normal rate. Unfortunately for some parents, it’s imperative that they track every last drop of food their baby eats since some infants are born with illnesses that make it harder to gain weight normally. Keeping track of diapers is also imperative to keeping your baby healthy. Everyone needs an easy way to check how often they’re changing diapers, and if everything looks normal during each change.

Just click the appropriate button at the beginning of the feeding and other activities. Your baby care history will be reliably stored. All this information may be useful when you visit the pediatrician, as well as for the further development of your child.

Check your baby’s day to day activities easily and efficiently. This baby care app will help you keep track of everything in one convenient place and help moms take care of themselves by having a peace of mind.

Email us your comments and suggestions, and we'll implement them as soon as possible!

Full Code is an intuitive, mobile-first simulation designed by medical experts for individuals who want to become better medical professionals, including medical students, residents, physicians, nurses, NPs, PAs, EMTs, paramedics, and more.

The platform offers over 230+ realistic virtual cases and an engaging, game-like interface. You can choose from hundreds of possible actions as you diagnose and treat acutely sick patients in this open-ended medical simulation.

Daily, deliberate practice is the key to maintaining and improving your clinical skills. Download and play a free case today!

Interested in bringing Full Code to your organization or institution? Learn more at fullcodemedical.com!

Features:
• 230+ case library written and peer-reviewed by expert clinicians
• Over 30 diagnostic disciplines, including Emergency Medicine, OBGYN, and Pediatrics
• 25+ realistic avatars, including pediatric and adult patients
• *NEW* EMS cases and ambulance environment
• Detailed scoring and full case breakdowns - learn your strengths and weaknesses
• Patient AI enables practice with history taking
• Full Code Pro + CME provides 100+ hours of accredited CME
• Frequent new cases and regular updates

TRAIN ON YOUR TERMS
Full Code’s on-demand simulation training with realistic virtual patients allows you to practice complex cases and enhance your skills whenever you get a break, wherever you happen to be, on the devices you already own.

IMPROVE YOUR CONFIDENCE
Full Code's infinitely repeatable cases measure skills in both diagnosis and management, allowing you to learn from your mistakes in a risk-free environment. Build competence so you can face complex real-world cases with confidence.

PRACTICE MAKES THE PRACTITIONER
Frequent, deliberate practice is the key to clinical success and improving your clinical decision-making ability. Full Code can easily fit into any schedule—whether you're a med student or practicing clinician.

NEW CHALLENGES 
Every case presents a new challenge in Full Code: from routine diagnosis to rare diseases. You’re not just limited to the hospital, either—Full Code has expanded into pre-hospital and EMS content. Get out of the ED and into the ambulance for all new scenarios!

LEARN FROM TOP MEDICAL EXPERTS
Created by medical educators from some of the top hospitals in the U.S. and peer-reviewed by licensed medical professionals, our simulations are designed with industry-standard medical best practices, setting the bar high for medical students and professionals worldwide. 

EARN CME CREDIT
Complete your continuing medical education (CME) requirements with flexible and engaging simulation challenges accredited through the Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education (ACCME). With our PRO+CME subscription, you can earn up to 100 CME credits. Subscribe to Full Code Pro+CME to get started.

Lify makes it simple to manage your health and your family's well-being. In one secure app, you can track your health journey, share detailed insights with your doctor, and collaborate with your care team. 

Your Complete Health Management Tool 
  Log Symptoms with Precision: Use our unique interactive body map to pinpoint and track your health concerns and symptoms. This creates a clear, detailed history of your health journey, perfect for sharing with your healthcare provider. 
  Create and Share Health Reports: Instantly combine your symptoms, vitals, and lifestyle data into a single, organized report. Sharing comprehensive updates with your doctor or care team is now simple and efficient. 
  Follow Your Personal Care Plan: Actively work towards your health goals. Follow care plans from your provider, monitor your progress, and share detailed updates on your achievements to ensure you and your care team are always aligned. 
  Discover Powerful Health Insights: Our health assessments help you understand your body better. Track changes over time and make more confident and informed decisions about your wellness journey. 
  Track Vitals, Measurements, and Lifestyle: Monitor all your key health metrics in one place. Log vital signs like blood pressure, track body measurements, and record lifestyle patterns. You can also add custom notes for a truly personalized health overview. 
  Receive Timely Reminders: Stay on track with your health regimen effortlessly. Get scheduled notifications for medications, appointments, and other important health tasks so you never miss a step.

Connect with Apple Health 
  Lify integrates securely with the Apple Health app, allowing you to see your complete health picture in one place. With your permission, you can: 
  Sync Your Data: Automatically import vitals, measurements, and activity data from the Apple Health app. 
  Consolidate Your Records: Save the health information you track in Lify directly to your Apple Health records. 
  This feature is optional and requires your explicit permission through Apple HealthKit. You are always in control of your data. 

Disclaimer and Privacy 
Lify is designed to support, not replace, the vital relationship between you and your healthcare providers. Always consult a physician or qualified health professional with any questions about a medical condition or before making medical decisions. This app is not intended for medical diagnosis or treatment.

Anatomy Touch Pro is a game, which provides an easy way to learn anatomical structures like bones, muscles or organs.


Features:

3 different modes to learn!

• Choose It:
In this mode an anatomical structure from a selected lesson is highlighted. 
You have to find the correct term out of 4 given options. 
Difficulty: easy
Perfect for beginners!

• Touch It:
An terminological name is given - like "humerus". 
Your task is to find this structure on an anatomical image and touch the correct body part. 
Difficulty: medium
Perfect for advanced learners!

• Type It:
An anatomical structure from the human body is highlighted. 
Your task is to type the name of the shown structure.
Difficulty: hard
Perfect for experts!


The language of the terms can be choosed between latin or english. 


Content of the lessons:

• overview of important bones
• skeleton of the hip and spinal column, upper and lower limb and the skull
• joints of the upper limb

• overview of important muscles
• muscles of the trunk, upper and lower limb, face

• overview of important organs
• anatomical structures of the heart, lungs, gastrointestinal tract and brain

• and many more will follow


High quality images of great authors like Johannes Sobotta and Sigismond Laskowski.


If you find any errors or if you have any suggestions, feel free to write me!

Diabetes goes where you go, now your glucose readings can too, with the Dexcom ONE+ Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) system and mobile app†.  
With the Dexcom ONE+ mobile app†, users can access their real-time glucose readings at a glance and set customisable alerts that can help warn of highs and lows, all with no finger pricks* or scanning. Discuss with your healthcare professional how you should use the information displayed on the Dexcom ONE+ to help manage your diabetes.
 
The Dexcom ONE+ mobile app† has been designed with enhanced features to help in the management of diabetes: 
•	The app-led onboarding allows users get started in a few clicks only. 
•	Share your glucose data with up to 10 followers who can monitor your glucose data and trends on their compatible smart device with the Dexcom Follow app. Share and Follow functions require an internet connection. 
•	Key diabetes metrics displayed in the Clarity Card section of the mobile app, so that users can see both real-time and retrospective glucose data.** 
•	Event logging where users can track activities like meal intake, exercise sessions and insulin injections, helping them better understand their glucose patterns.1 
•	Alerts to notify users 12-hours before the end of a sensor session, so you can change your sensor when it’s convenient for you.1  
 
Apple Watch: 
•	View your glucose information, trend graph, and alerts right from your wrist with the Dexcom ONE+ Apple Watch app. Watches require compatible smart device to use app. 
 
Learn more at Dexcom.com. 
 
This app is only for use with the Dexcom ONE+ Continuous Glucose Monitoring System. 
 
*If your glucose alerts and readings from the Dexcom ONE+ do not match symptoms or expectations, use a blood glucose meter to make diabetes treatment decisions 
† Smart device sold separately. For a list of compatible devices, visit www.dexcom.com/compatibility. 
**An internet connection is required for patients to send their glucose data to Dexcom Clarity via a compatible smart device: dexcom.com/compatibility. 
1 Dexcom ONE+ User Guide, 2023.

STOP YOUR SNORING AND CONTROL YOUR PROGRESS! Don't let snoring and sleep talking ruin your rest!

Request and enjoy soundscapes generated by artificial intelligence to relax and fall asleep easily. You can also create your own custom soundscapes based on personal preferences.

Sleep better and feel rested in the morning!

Huckleberry is your all-in-one parenting partner, proudly trusted by 5+ million families worldwide. 

From baby tracker to personalized guidance, our award-winning app helps you navigate sleep, feeding, milestones, and everything in between. TRUSTED SLEEP GUIDANCE & TRACKING

Your baby's sleep and daily rhythms are unique. Our comprehensive baby tracker helps you understand their natural patterns while providing expert sleep guidance every step of the way. From breastfeeding to nappies, our newborn tracker gives you peace of mind in those early days and beyond.

SWEETSPOT®: YOUR SLEEP TIMING COMPANION

A most-loved feature that predicts your baby's ideal nap times with remarkable accuracy. No more guessing about sleep windows or watching for tired cues—SweetSpot® learns your child's unique rhythms to suggest optimal sleep times. Available with Plus and Premium memberships.

BERRY: 24/7 PARENTING GUIDANCE 

Instant parenting backup that adapts to what you need, when you need it. Using expert-vetted and AI-powered guidance, Berry can work through the messiness of parenting with you. You can solve challenges, get reassurance, and easily track multiple things at once—all in one AI chat. No matter the moment or mood, you always have backup.

FREE APP FEATURES

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP

• Everything in Plus, and:

GENTLE, EVIDENCE-BASED APPROACH

Our sleep guidance never requires "crying it out." Instead, we blend trusted sleep science with gentle, family-centered solutions that respect your parenting style. Every recommendation is made for your family's needs and comfort level.

PERSONALIZED PARENTING SUPPORT

• Expert newborn tracker tools and analytics
• Get custom sleep schedules based on your baby's age and patterns
• Science-backed guidance for common sleep challenges
• Navigate sleep regressions with confidence

• Help your newborn develop healthy sleep habits from day one

AWARD-WINNING RESULTS

The Huckleberry baby tracker app ranked #1 in the iOS medical category globally. Today, we help families across 179 countries achieve better sleep. Up to 93% of families using our baby sleep tracking report improved sleep patterns.
